title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ezra Levant & Jason Whitlock | 4/13/21
description:
FEMA is now offering grants for COVID-related funeral costs, including to illegal immigrants. Rebel News founder Ezra Levant returns with video proof that Canadian police have harassed and arrested his journalists. Journalist Jason Whitlock gives his take on a BLM founder’s house-buying spree, sin in America, and the death of black man Daunte Wright during a police traffic stop.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
